value.desc: Model of the component defining it's current state (opened or closed); Either use this property (along with a listener for 'input' event) OR use v-model directive

name.desc: A unique value used to identify this tab panel

label.desc: The label to be displayed in the titlebar

separator.desc: If true, a separator is displayed between the titlebar and the slotted content

icon.desc: If set, displays an icon in the titlebar

icon-size.desc: The size to be used for icons

expand-icon.desc: If set, displays an icon to be used for expand

expanded-icon.desc: If set, displays an icon to be used for expanded

click-icon.desc: If true, then only the expand/expanded icons can be used to open/close the tab panel instead of the titlebar

align.desc: Used for the alignment of the label on the titlebar

titlebar.desc: Scoped Slot for replacing the titlebar

icon.desc: The icon of the current tab panel

label.desc: The label of the current tab panel

opened.desc: true if the current tab panel is opened

expand.desc: The expand icon of the current tab panel

expanded.desc: The expanded icon of the current tab panel

isOpen.desc: Checks to see if the tab panel is open

returns.desc: Returns true if the tab panel is opened, otherwise false

open.desc: Opens the tab panel only if it does not have the property `disable` set to true onthe tab panel

returns.desc: Returns true if the tab panel was opened, otherwise false
